channel.title: Masters Student on Gioele La Manno
channel.description: Recent content in Masters Student on Gioele La Manno

item.title: Lisa Dravta
item.description: Short Bio I have joined the La Manno Lab for a semester project as part of my Master’s program in Computational Neurosciences. I will be looking into extracting new information from the single cell atlas of the developmental mouse brain. My background is in Life Sciences and Engineering, with a special focus on neurosciences, genomics, programming and data analysis.

item.title: Roger Aylagas Torres
item.description: Short Bio My name is Roger Aylagas Torres and I am from Barcelona, Catalonia. I studied my BSc in Telecommunication Engineering at the Universitat Polit√®cnica de Catalunya with a minor in Audiovisual Signal Processing and I am currently pursuing a MSc in Advanced Telecommunication also at UPC with the path of Artificial Intelligence for Multimedia. I am currently doing my Master Thesis in the La Manno Lab and I am working on building a self-supervised algorithm for the integration of scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq data.
